pages.title: The Void
pages.text: $(italic)$(7)When worlds collapsed...$(br)Legends awakened.$(br2)$(8)A fracture. A tear in the fabric of space.$(br)A collision of forgotten realms.
$(7)$(italic)Fossils. Symbols. Shadows.$(br)A storm of lost memories...

pages.title: The Fall
pages.text: $(8)Five worlds were torn apart.$(br)Their memories scattered.$(br)Their creatures set free.
$(7)$(italic)Jungles clash with ruins.$(br)Deserts shimmer with magic.$(br)A world stitched by chaos.

pages.title: The Awakening
pages.text: $(8)You are not from here.$(br2)But you were summoned by the Nexus.$(br)To restore... or rewrite... what remains of the legends.
$(7)$(italic)Echoes of the past.$(br)Ruin and power waiting to rise.

pages.title: The Mission
pages.text: $(8)There is no prophecy.$(br)No guidance.$(br2)Only choice.$(br2)You decide what must be reborn...$(br)and what must be forgotten.
